Reviews.Content: Clean and cheap but showing age I have stayed at Mastapa several times over the years, most recently July and August of 2007. The service is great and the pool/courtyard is lush and beautiful. The rooms are really showing age and could handle an upgrade. The lighting is dim, mini bar showing rust, furniture and curtains are faded and scuffed. Love the morning breakfast. If you are looking for a cheap option in a great location in Kuta, this is a good spot. You might find better, though.
Reviews.Author: papua2001mk

Reviews.Content: Quiet oasis Very clean and friendly family run hotel. Situated on the busy Jalan Legian road but step beyond the entrance and it was another world.Small pool had recently been added which was not advertised when we booked, this was a pleasant addition.Lovely gardens with ponds and seating. Nice place to relax after running the gauntlet of Jalan Legian shop owners.Rooms comfortable and clean. Staff friendly.Food plain but OK.
Reviews.Author: Angeb
